Description: Posted by  Gracesela Nurjaya  Hiring for Java Developer in Malaysia | Tech Talent Acquisition in Nityo Infotech  Send InMail Job Desc: As a Senior Backend Engineer, you'll ship software that matters. You'll play an important role in helping as the leading BAAS provider in Southeast Asia. You'll innovate on architecture, write impactful software and contribute to enhanced output across the technology team.  Requirements: - We are hiring senior backend engineers with 4-6 years of engineering experience - Strong in depth experience of Java is required - Hands on working experience of Java, Spring Integration, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Gradle, Maven, Junit, TestNg - Experience with transactional RDBMS such as MySQL & Postgres along with strong fundamentals of schema design - Experience in a git based code management workflow is a must. - Understanding of best practices for securing your code. - Strong grasp of enterprise software design patterns and data structures. - Understanding cloud based deployments and workflows and understanding of scaling code in production - Competent in software engineering tools (e.g. Java build tools) and best practices (e.g. unit testing, test automation, continuous integration, etc.). - Having a Team-oriented approach so as to effectively participate with team members across regions, as well as work cross-functionally with other organizations. - Vocal, passionate and driven about solving problems via engineering.

Location: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia On-site
Description: Do you want to work with passionate teams, providing excellent business and digital services to the Asia Pacific region?  Do you want an open, supportive, and caring working environment?  Do you view your development needs seriously as we do?  If YES, then take your career to the #NextLevel with BASF !  Objectives of the Position  At BASF Digital Hub Kuala Lumpur we develop innovative digital solutions for BASF, create new exciting customer experiences and business growth, and drive efficiencies in processes, helping to strengthen BASF´s position as the digital leader in the chemical industry. We believe the right path is through creativity, trial and error and great people working and learning together. Become part of our team and develop the future with us - in a global team that embraces diversity and equal opportunities.  The research group Computational Chemistry Solutions develops digital solutions to provide decision support to research and development activities.  Main Tasks  Help to shape a growing interdisciplinary, agile DevOps team Frontend and backend development and maintenance of modern tools on HPC systems as well as web applications Use modern development technologies, including version control for code and data Design and build scalable flows for validation, ingestion and processing of data Building reusable code and libraries for future use, including automated testing, and documentation Optimization of applications for maximum speed and scalability Implementation of security and data protection Constant exchange with research scientists in the team to discuss translation of user requirements into viable technical implementations  Requirements  Education and work experience  A Bachelor or master’s degree in Computational Chemistry / Cheminformatics or Computer Science with a strong Chemistry background or a (Computational) Chemistry / Chemical Engineering degree with a strong Computer Science background. Additionally, at least 2 years of experience in a similar position.  Technical & Professional Knowledge (mandatory)  Profound experience in Python; furthermore, experience in languages like Vue.js, Java-script, Angular Experience with Linux and SQL as well as NoSQL databases (esp. Neo4j) Familiarity with Linux-based HPC systems Familiarity in agile ways of working (Scrum/Kanban) and DevOps elements (e.g. unit testing, version control with GitLab, containerization) High ability to work in a structured and precise manner Excellent problem-solving and communication skills Team player with strong interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills Fluent in English, both written and spoken  Technical & Professional Knowledge (additional Plus/nice To Have Skills)  Experience with Quantum Chemistry and Quantum Chemical codes Experience in Spark Experience in Palantir Foundry  BASF regional service hub has been established since 2005 in Kuala Lumpur. The regional service hub has approximately 700 employees and growing. Focused on being a competency and digitalization driven hub, it also provides quality functional and know-how services in the areas of finance, controlling, human resources, real estate and facilities management, communications, environmental, health and safety, procurement, import-export order management, and information services to BASF companies and affiliates in the Asia Pacific region. BASF also has two other regional hubs located in Berlin, Germany, and Montevideo, Uruguay that cover the Europe and Americas regions.  At BASF, we create chemistry for a sustainable future. We combine economic success with environmental protection and social responsibility. More than 110,000 employees in the BASF Group contribute to the success of our customers in nearly all sectors and almost every country in the world. Our portfolio is organized into six segments: Chemicals, Materials, Industrial Solutions, Surface Technologies, Nutrition & Care and Agricultural Solutions. BASF generated sales of €59 billion in 2020. Further information at www.basf.com.  Primary Location  MY-Kuala Lumpur-Kuala Lumpur  Job  Digitalization  02-Mar-2022, 11:59:00 PM  For BASF, diversity is one of the essential keys to business success and the well-being of our employees. We promote an inclusive culture that accepts the diversity of people, experiences and capabilities. Join the team and connect with more than 117,000 other minds. Stay alert for possible recruitment fraud!  This can include fake websites, fake job offers, or contact from a person falsely claiming to represent BASF.

Great remuneration and benefits Good career opportunities to progress into senior position   About Our Client  An Asia leading MNC in the Financial Services industry is recruiting a Junior Software Develoepr to join them. They have a long history in Asia and it's a great organization that supports and encourages career growth and excellence. Successful candidates should have good experience in Java, NodeJS, ReactJS.  Job Description   Design, Build and Deploy adjustments to the web application Implement and deploy RESTful APIs to the backend service Support each phase of product development which includes Design, Implement, Monitor, and Feedback Write well designed, testable code as well as participate in design reviews and code reviews   The Successful Applicant   BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or other related majors Experience with Java, NodeJS, and ReactJS Experience with MongoDB will be a bonus Experience with Kubernetes or Docker will be a bonus Experience in deploying web applications to production Understanding of web stack, web protocols, and web performance optimization techniques Good UI design sense and implementation Good basics on engineering best practice, testable code, and design pattern   What's On Offer   A team of like-minded professionals supporting each other Good career opportunities to progress into senior position Great remuneration and benefits   Contact: Clinton Guok  Quote job ref: JN-122021-4542650
